Tuileries

Natural Health and Beauty
Inspired by French living. Born in Detroit.

About Tuileries

Tuileries is a boutique in Surburban Detroit centered on bringing customers natural and organic products. After embarking on a year-long journey for the best ingredients and products in health and beauty products, we founded Tuileries in 2012.

Inspired by French living with a focus on quality products that naturally improve and maintain beauty, Tuileries is the ultimate destination for everyday health and beauty products.

Our Products

We carefully curate each and every brand for our shop to ensure the highest quality with minimal processing in our products. Tuileries works with world-class manufacturers to bring organic and natural products to our customers.

Our evaluation for each product depends on a variety of factors including quality of ingredients, absence of harmful chemicals, impact on the environment, and sustainability of the manufacturing process.

Looking for an organic shampoo and conditioner? Try Skabu Organics, our luxury argan oil shampoo.

Location

Located in the heart of Main Street Novi, Tuileries is easily accessible with ample free parking.

43155 Main Street
Suite 2202B
Novi, MI 48375
